items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
items.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

items.content_html: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.
items.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

items.content_html: Mini CI/CD Job Monitor is a lightweight system designed to automate the management of CI/CD jobs. The system consists of a React frontend, GraphQL API, RabbitMQ message queue, and Node.js workers, making it a powerful yet simple solution for triggering, monitoring, and managing build/test jobs in a pipeline.
items.title: blackhat955/Minicicdmonitor: Mini CI/CD Job Monitor is a lightweight system designed to automate the management of CI/CD jobs. The system consists of a React frontend, GraphQL API, RabbitMQ message queue, and Node.js workers, making it a powerful yet simple solution for triggering, monitoring, and managing build/test jobs in a pipeline.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: ngx-heroicons is a lightweight, type-safe Angular library for rendering Heroicons as inline SVGs. It supports all icon styles (outline, solid, mini, micro), works seamlessly with Tailwind CSS, and requires no runtime HTTP requests. Ideal for modern Angular apps.
items.title: atheodosiou/ngx-heroicons: ngx-heroicons is a lightweight, type-safe Angular library for rendering Heroicons as inline SVGs. It supports all icon styles (outline, solid, mini, micro), works seamlessly with Tailwind CSS, and requires no runtime HTTP requests. Ideal for modern Angular apps.

items.content_html: A lightweight reactive front-end framework inspired by Vue and Solid.js. Features fine-grained reactivity, directives, component system, and support for slots and templates — built for developers who believe in writing their own engine at least once.
items.title: ahibis/my-framework: A lightweight reactive front-end framework inspired by Vue and Solid.js. Features fine-grained reactivity, directives, component system, and support for slots and templates — built for developers who believe in writing their own engine at least once.
